DevOps&Cloud Facts.quote: DevOpsFacts!
❝A compound of development (Dev) and operations (Ops), DevOps is the union of people, process, and technology to continually provide value to customers.❞
DevOps&Cloud Facts.author: Microsoft

DevOps&Cloud Facts.quote: ❝DevOps adoption means that you are willing to change fast, develop fast, test fast, fail fast, recover fast, learn fast and push the product/features fast to the market.❞
DevOps&Cloud Facts.author: Pavan Belagatti

DevOps&Cloud Facts.quote: ❝DevOps goes beyond just playing a role; the more employees who adopt its principles, the greater the benefits to a business.❞
DevOps&Cloud Facts.author: Yahya Abulhaj

DevOps&Cloud Facts.quote: “Practice the philosophy of continuous improvement. Get a little bit better every single day.”
DevOps&Cloud Facts.author: Brian Tracy

DevOps&Cloud Facts.quote: ❝DevOps enables formerly siloed roles—development, IT operations, quality engineering, and security—to coordinate and collaborate to produce better, more reliable products. By adopting a DevOps culture along with DevOps practices and tools, teams gain the ability to better respond to customer needs, increase confidence in the applications they build, and achieve business goals faster.❞
DevOps&Cloud Facts.author: Microsoft

DevOps&Cloud Facts.quote: ❝CI stands for continuous integration, a fundamental DevOps best practice where developers frequently merge code changes into a central repository where automated builds and tests run. But CD can either mean continuous delivery or continuous deployment.❞
DevOps&Cloud Facts.author: Atlassian

DevOps&Cloud Facts.quote: ❝DevOps is a way of thinking, followed by a hierarchy that emphasizes cooperation, teamwork, a way to bring administrators and developers together, and various cutting-edge tools combined to meet customer needs more quickly.❞
DevOps&Cloud Facts.author: Yahya Abulhaj

DevOps&Cloud Facts.quote: ❝Agile refers to an iterative approach which focuses on collaboration, customer feedback, and small, rapid releases. DevOps is considered a practice of bringing development and operations teams together.❞
❝Agile and DevOps are for harnessing integration, interaction, and innovation.❞
DevOps&Cloud Facts.author: Pearl Zhu

DevOps&Cloud Facts.quote: ❝To successfully implement continuous delivery, you need to change the culture of how an entire organization views software development efforts.❞
❝If you adopt only one agile practice, let it be retrospectives. Everything else will follow.❞

❝CI/CD is a DevOps technique that simplifies your Agile development by using the right tools to speed up deployment. DevOps extends your Agile development all the way into production, using practices that are not present in Agile's workflows.❞
❝Currently, DevOps is more like a philosophical movement, not yet a precise collection of practices, descriptive or prescriptive.❞

❝DevOps is a culture, fostering collaboration amongst all participants involved in the development and maintenance of software. Agile can be described as a development methodology designed to maintain productivity and drive releases with the common reality of changing needs.❞
DevOps&Cloud Facts.author: Microsoft

DevOps&Cloud Facts.quote: ❝DevOps is all about the unification and automation of processes, and DevOps engineers are instrumental in combining code, application maintenance, and application management. All of these tasks rely on understanding not only development life cycles, but DevOps culture, and its philosophy, practices, and tools.❞
DevOps&Cloud Facts.author: RedHat

DevOps&Cloud Facts.quote: ❝The most powerful tool we have as developers is automation.❞
DevOps&Cloud Facts.author: Scott Hanselman

DevOps&Cloud Facts.quote: ❝DevOps is the combination of cultural philosophies, practices, and tools that increases an organization’s ability to deliver applications and services at high velocity❞
DevOps&Cloud Facts.author: Amazon

DevOps&Cloud Facts.quote: ❝DevOps is evolving and improving products at a faster pace than organizations using traditional software development and infrastructure management processes. This speed enables organizations to better serve their customers and compete more effectively in the market.❞
DevOps&Cloud Facts.author: Amazon

DevOps&Cloud Facts.quote: ☁️CloudFacts!☁️
❝First to mind when asked what 'the cloud' is, a majority respond it’s either an actual cloud, the sky, or something related to weather.❞
DevOps&Cloud Facts.author: Citrix

DevOps&Cloud Facts.quote: ❝Cloud computing is the delivery of different services through the Internet. These resources include tools and applications like data storage, servers, databases, networking, and software❞
DevOps&Cloud Facts.author: Investopedia

DevOps&Cloud Facts.quote: ❝Cloud computing is often far more secure than traditional computing, because companies like Google and Amazon can attract and retain cyber-security personnel of a higher quality than many governmental agencies.❞
DevOps&Cloud Facts.author: Vivek Kundra

DevOps&Cloud Facts.quote: ❝Cloud computing is a great euphemism for centralization of computer services under one server.❞
DevOps&Cloud Facts.author: Evgeny Morozov

DevOps&Cloud Facts.quote: There are many Cloud Service providers in the market Amazon Web Service AWS, ServerSpace, Microsoft Azure, Google Cloud Platform, IBM Cloud Services, Adobe Creative Cloud.
❝Cloud computing is a challenge to security, but one that can be overcome.❞
DevOps&Cloud Facts.author: Whitfield Diffie

DevOps&Cloud Facts.quote: ❝Cloud is about how you do computing, not where you do computing.❞
DevOps&Cloud Facts.author: Paul Maritz

DevOps&Cloud Facts.quote: ❝I don't need a hard disk in my computer if I can get to the server faster… carrying around these non-connected computers is byzantine by comparison.❞
DevOps&Cloud Facts.author: Steve Jobs

DevOps&Cloud Facts.quote: ❝If someone asks me what cloud computing is, I try not to get bogged down with definitions. I tell them that, simply put, cloud computing is a better way to run your business.❞
DevOps&Cloud Facts.author: Marc Benioff, CEO Salesforce

DevOps&Cloud Facts.quote: ❝Every kid coming out of school now thinks he can be the next Mark Zuckerberg, and with these new technologies like cloud computing, he actually has a shot.❞
DevOps&Cloud Facts.author: Marc Andreessen, Co-founder of Netscape, Board Member of Facebook
